        Draws the attributed string at (x, y), rotated by the specified angle about (x, y).
        Parameters:
        text - the attributed string (null not permitted).
        g2 - the graphics output target.
        angle - the angle.
        x - the x-coordinate.
        y - the y-coordinate.
